item.title: Regatta Cheatsheet
item.description: The ORC Rec Guide to Regattas A guide to everything regattas: a packing list, approximate scheduling, de-rigging and re-rigging, trailer loading, rules of racing, race plans, and more. Contents Equipment List Scheduling De-Rigging and Rigging Trailer Loading Rules of Racing Race Plans Equipment List A list of gear to pack in your regatta bag. Three wrenches: 10mm, 7/16”, and an adjustable - you will need all three!
